solution_line_template: If in eight years Brian will be {brian_future_age} years old, he is currently {brian_future_age}-{years_in_future} = <<{brian_future_age}-{years_in_future}={brian_current_age}>>{brian_current_age} years old.

Since Christian is twice as old as Brian, he is {christian_age_multiplier}*{brian_current_age} = <<{christian_age_multiplier}*{brian_current_age}={christian_current_age}>>{christian_current_age} years old.
In {years_in_future} years, Christian will be {christian_current_age}+{years_in_future} = <<{christian_current_age}+{years_in_future}={christian_future_age}>>{christian_future_age} years old.
